body_html: Thank you. So may I know how I can make multiple net objects of the same net in each thread? I assume that right now, everything is happening in the "default" workspace, and so I think I might have to create multiple workspaces and assign each workspace a copy of the same net?

body: Thank you. So may I know how I can make multiple net objects of the same net in each thread? I assume that right now, everything is happening in the "default" workspace, and so I think I might have to create multiple workspaces and assign each workspace a copy of the same net?
